title: Egypt Inflation Holds Steady, May Give Scope for More Rate Cuts
description: Egypt’s inflation rate was unchanged in December, potentially giving the central bank scope to further cut borrowing costs in 2026.
content: Egypt’s inflation rate was unchanged in December, potentially giving the central bank scope to further cut borrowing costs in 2026.
